mdRecord.dcterms:title: Gas X-ray tube
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Victor Macalaster Wiggin Company [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gas X-ray tube on a wooden stand. Engraved on glass: "Victor, Macalaster Wiggin Co., Trade Mark, Made in Boston, Tungsten, 478." Macalaster Wiggin Co. merged with Victor Electric Co. and later became General Electric Co. This item was given in honor of Theodore E. Keats, M.D., F.A.C.R., Chair of the UVa Department of Radiology from 1963-1991. [original]
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff. [original]
Donated by Dr. Daniel L. Seale [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical instruments or apparatus--X-rays--Equipment and supplies
